${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:Cauterize.NAME: Bonfire
${modID}:Cauterize.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Discard the card left of this. NL ${modID}:Coda !M! : ${modID}:Cure !${modID}:H! .

${modID}:BlazingStrike.NAME: Blazing Slash
${modID}:BlazingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard the card left of this.

${modID}:Chiwen.NAME: Turbulent Blaze
${modID}:Chiwen.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! [${modID}:ScorchIcon] to ALL enemies. NL Take !M! Damage.

${modID}:PrayerofWrath.NAME: Prayer of Wrath
${modID}:PrayerofWrath.DESCRIPTION: On ${modID}:Chant: Apply !M! [${modID}:ScorchIcon] to a random enemy. NL ${modID}:Coda 3 : Deal !D! damage to a random enemy.

${modID}:HolyFlash.NAME: Divine Flare
${modID}:HolyFlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! [#fcad03](8+[] [#fcad03]2x[] [${modID}:ZealIcon] [#fcad03])[] damage. NL Draw {!M!|1= a card|2>=!M! cards}{@@} [#fcad03](1+[] [#fcad03]0.25x[] [${modID}:ZealIcon]  [#fcad03])[]
${modID}:HolyFlash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! [#fcad03](10+[] [#fcad03]3x[] [${modID}:ZealIcon] [#fcad03])[] damage. NL Draw {!M!|1= a card|2>=!M! cards}{@@} [#fcad03](1+[] [#fcad03]0.5x[] [${modID}:ZealIcon]  [#fcad03])[]

${modID}:Charr.NAME: Charr
${modID}:Charr.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! [${modID}:VulnerableIcon] . NL Apply !${modID}:M2! [${modID}:ScorchIcon] to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Fantatism.NAME: Fanaticism
${modID}:Fantatism.DESCRIPTION: Take !${modID}:M2! damage. NL Gain {!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|4=[E] [E] [E ][E]|5= !M! [E]}. NL Draw {!M!|<2=a card|>1=!M! cards} {@@}. NL Suffer 1 [${modID}:VulnerableIcon]

${modID}:ShoulderCheck.NAME: Shoulder Check
${modID}:ShoulderCheck.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have [${modID}:ReinforceIcon] gain [E] [E] and draw a card.

${modID}:Excaliburn.NAME: Excaliburn
${modID}:Excaliburn.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an attack, Deal !${modID}:M2! damage and apply !M! [${modID}:ScorchIcon] to a random enemy. NL Take !M! Damage .

${modID}:DivineShield.NAME: Divine Shield
${modID}:DivineShield.DESCRIPTION: After you play a card that gains [${modID}:BlockIcon] , Add *Consecration to your hand and for each [E] spent ${modID}:Cure !${modID}:H! and 1 Strength.

${modID}:RelentlessPursuit.NAME: Relentless Pursuit
${modID}:RelentlessPursuit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !${modID}:WOG! [#fcad03]+[] [#fcad03]50%[] [${modID}:BlockIcon] [#fcad03] damage. NL [${modID}:BlockIcon] gained this turn damages target enemy.

${modID}:RepairArmor.NAME: Repair Armor
${modID}:RepairArmor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! [${modID}:BlockIcon] . NL Remove your [${modID}:FrailIcon] . NL Gain !M! [${modID}:ReinforceIcon] .

${modID}:RebuketheViolent.NAME: Rebuke the Violent
${modID}:RebuketheViolent.DESCRIPTION: When attacked, apply !M! [${modID}:WeakIcon] and apply [${modID}:PoisonIcon] equal to half the damage taken.

${modID}:ThunderousOration.NAME: Thunderous Oration
${modID}:ThunderousOration.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you ${modID}:Chant, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:BeaconofLight.NAME: Beacon of Light
${modID}:BeaconofLight.DESCRIPTION: Create a set aside copy of this. NL ${modID}:Coda !M!. NL On ${modID}:Chant : ${modID}:Cure !${modID}:H! .

${modID}:sinnerslament.NAME: Sinners Lament
${modID}:sinnerslament.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Coda 6: Lose !M! HP. NL On ${modID}:Chant: ALL enemies lose HP equal to twice your [${modID}:DevotionIcon] .

${modID}:YieldmyFlesh.NAME: Yield my Flesh
${modID}:YieldmyFlesh.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Chant your next Verse whenever you lose HP during your turn. NL On ${modID}:Coda: ${modID}:Cure !${modID}:H! .

${modID}:SeraphForm.NAME: Seraph Form
${modID}:SeraphForm.DESCRIPTION: The first time you heal each turn, draw a card and deal damage equal to your [${modID}:DevotionIcon] to ALL enemies.

${modID}:consecration.NAME: Consecration
${modID}:consecration.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, apply !M! [${modID}:ScorchIcon] to ALL enemies and Gain !M! [${modID}:ConfessionIcon] twice.

${modID}:CrystalChakram.NAME: Crystal Chakram
${modID}:CrystalChakram.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card.

${modID}:FrostyCaltrops.NAME: Frosty Caltrops
${modID}:FrostyCaltrops.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Cantrip. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain a ${modID}:Crystal Orb Slot.

${modID}:Nightrunner.NAME: Nightrunner
${modID}:Nightrunner.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Cantrip. NL Gain !B! [${modID}:BlockIcon] . NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust

${modID}:BladedSleeves.NAME: Bladed Sleeves
${modID}:BladedSleeves.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Cantrip. NL Channel an ${modID}:Icicle. NL Deal !D! Damage.

${modID}:CryoShrapnel.NAME: Cryo Shrapnel
${modID}:CryoShrapnel.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Flourish !M! times. NL ALL enemies take !M! additional damage this turn.

${modID}:LeadAstray.NAME: Lead Astray
${modID}:LeadAstray.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! [${modID}:WeakIcon] . NL Gain !B! [${modID}:BlockIcon] . NL ${modID}:Exploit any 2: ${modID}:Sheathe up to !M! cards left of this.

${modID}:IcicleSpear.NAME: Icicle Spear
${modID}:IcicleSpear.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! [${modID}:RangedIcon] damage to a random enemy for each Channeled ${modID}:Icicle.

${modID}:WisteriaCutter.NAME: Wisteria Slash
${modID}:WisteriaCutter.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Channel !M! ${modID}:Icicles. NL  ${modID}:Tilt 3: Gain [E] [E]

${modID}:Feint.NAME: Feint
${modID}:Feint.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! [${modID}:LockonIcon] . NL ${modID}:Exploit any: ${modID}:Flourish.

${modID}:LinkBreak.NAME: Link Break
${modID}:LinkBreak.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! [${modID}:VulnerableIcon] . NL Apply !${modID}:M2! [dragonmod:BleedIcon] .

${modID}:FreezeOver.NAME: Freeze Over
${modID}:FreezeOver.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards and Retain them this turn. NL You cannot play them this turn.

${modID}:Rimeshank.NAME: Rimeshank
${modID}:Rimeshank.DESCRIPTION: Attacks that 0 cost deal !M! additional damage and apply !${modID}:M2! [dragonmod:BleedIcon] .
${modID}:Rimeshank.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Attacks that 0 cost deal !M! additional damage and apply !${modID}:M2! [dragonmod:BleedIcon]

${modID}:SleevedAce.NAME: Sleeved Ace
${modID}:SleevedAce.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Flourish. NL ${modID}:Sheathe the card left of this, it costs 0 until played.

${modID}:HowlingBlast.NAME: Howling Blast
${modID}:HowlingBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! [#2a89f5](11[] [#2a89f5]+[] [#2a89f5]target[] [${modID}:ChillIcon] [#2a89f5])[] damage. NL Apply !M! [#2a89f5](4[] [#2a89f5]+[] [#2a89f5]target[] [${modID}:ChillIcon] [#2a89f5])[] [dragonmod:BleedIcon] to ALL enemies.
${modID}:HowlingBlast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! [#2a89f5](11[] [#2a89f5]+2x[] [#2a89f5]target[] [${modID}:ChillIcon] [#2a89f5])[] damage. NL Apply !M! [#2a89f5](4[] [#2a89f5]+2x[] [#2a89f5]target[] [${modID}:ChillIcon] [#2a89f5])[] [dragonmod:BleedIcon] to ALL enemies.

${modID}:ExposeWeakpoint.NAME: Expose Weakpoint
${modID}:ExposeWeakpoint.DESCRIPTION: Whenever target enemy takes unblocked damage, they gain !M! [dragonmod:VulnerableIcon] and take !${modID}:M2! additional damage for the turn.

${modID}:Cryolattice.NAME: Cryolattice
${modID}:Cryolattice.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Once per turn after you Remove an ${modID}:Icicle, gain a ${modID}:Crystal Orb Slot.
${modID}:Cryolattice.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Once per turn after you Remove an ${modID}:Icicle, gain a ${modID}:Crystal Orb Slot.

${modID}:ExhaleofHoarfrost.NAME: Exhale of Hoarfrost
${modID}:ExhaleofHoarfrost.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! [dragonmod:ChillIcon] to ALL enemies.

${modID}:IcyVeins.NAME: Icy Veins
${modID}:IcyVeins.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! [dragonmod:StrengthIcon] and [dragonmod:FocusIcon] . NL After you remove an Orb gain !M! [${modID}:BlockIcon] .
${modID}:IcyVeins.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! [dragonmod:StrengthIcon] and [dragonmod:FocusIcon] . NL After you remove an Orb gain !M! [${modID}:BlockIcon] .

${modID}:PokerDart.NAME: Poker Dart
${modID}:PokerDart.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy, repeat for each card left of this. NL Gain !B! [${modID}:BlockIcon] increased by !B! for each card right of this.

${modID}:AuroraVeil.NAME: Aurora Veil
${modID}:AuroraVeil.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! . NL Apply !M! [${modID}:WeakIcon] to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Slipstream.NAME: Slipstream
${modID}:Slipstream.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! [${modID}:BlockIcon] . NL If the enemy intends to attack, Retain your leftmost card this turn and apply !M! [dragonmod:ChillIcon] .

${modID}:DeathlyDispute.NAME: Deathly Dispute
${modID}:DeathlyDispute.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Glimpse !M! cards. NL ${modID}:Exploit any !M!: Gain !${modID}:M2! Gold and Exhaust.

${modID}:SilverShadow.NAME: Silver Shadow
${modID}:SilverShadow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Tilt 3: Whenever you are attacked this turn, apply !M! [${modID}:LockonIcon] back.

${modID}:FrostyFlash.NAME: Frosty Flash
${modID}:FrostyFlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! [${modID}:RangedIcon] damage and apply !M! [${modID}:LockonIcon] to ALL enemies.

${modID}:RupturingShot.NAME: Rupturing Chakram
${modID}:RupturingShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! [${modID}:RangedIcon] damage. NL Apply !M! [dragonmod:BleedIcon] . NL Gain !${modID}:M2! [dragonmod:SubzeroIcon] .

${modID}:ConeofCold.NAME: Cone of Cold
${modID}:ConeofCold.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies twice. NL ${modID}:Sheathe a random card in your discard pile
${modID}:ConeofCold.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies twice. NL ${modID}:Sheathe the top card of your discard pile

${modID}:FractalShell.NAME: Fractal Arrow
${modID}:FractalShell.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! [${modID}:RangedIcon] damage. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Crystal Orb Slots. NL Channel an ${modID}:Icicle.

${modID}:Squall.NAME: Squall
${modID}:Squall.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! [${modID}:LockonIcon] . NL ${modID}:Sheathe cards next to this.

${modID}:StreetRink.NAME: Street Rink
${modID}:StreetRink.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! [${modID}:VulnerableIcon] . NL ${modID}:Exploit [dragonmod:ChillIcon] : Gain !B! [${modID}:BlockIcon] [#2a89f5](4[] [#2a89f5]+[] [#2a89f5]target[] [${modID}:ChillIcon] [#2a89f5])[] and Halve their [${modID}:ChillIcon] .
${modID}:StreetRink.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! [${modID}:VulnerableIcon] to ALL enemies. NL ${modID}:Exploit [dragonmod:ChillIcon] : Gain !B! [${modID}:BlockIcon] [#2a89f5](4[] [#2a89f5]+[] [#2a89f5]target[] [${modID}:ChillIcon] [#2a89f5])[] and Halve their [${modID}:ChillIcon] .

${modID}:GlacialAdvance.NAME: Glacial Advance
${modID}:GlacialAdvance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! [${modID}:BlockIcon] . NL After you remove an Orb, Deal !M! [${modID}:RangedIcon] damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:IceBarrier.NAME: Ice Barrier
${modID}:IceBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! [${modID}:ReinforceIcon] . NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, apply !M! [dragonmod:ChillIcon] and [${modID}:SlowIcon] back.

${modID}:WraithsLegerdemain.NAME: Wraith's Legerdemain
${modID}:WraithsLegerdemain.DESCRIPTION: Draw {!M!|1=a card|1>=!M! cards} . NL ${modID}:Tilt 3 : Next turn, Gain {!${modID}:M2!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|4>=!${modID}:M2! [E]}{@@} and draw an additional card.

${modID}:ShadowStep.NAME: Shadow Step
${modID}:ShadowStep.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! [${modID}:BlockIcon] [#2a89f5](6[] [#2a89f5]+[] [#2a89f5]2x [#2a89f5]Cards[] [#2a89f5]right[] [#2a89f5]of[] [#2a89f5]this)[] NL ${modID}:Tilt !M! : Choose a card in your draw pile to put on top.
${modID}:ShadowStep.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! [${modID}:BlockIcon] [#2a89f5](9[] [#2a89f5]+[] [#2a89f5]2x [#2a89f5]Cards[] [#2a89f5]right[] [#2a89f5]of[] [#2a89f5]this)[] NL ${modID}:Tilt !M! : Choose a card in your draw pile to put on top.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Put on top of your draw pile

${modID}:CordonofMirages.NAME: Trickster's Ruse
${modID}:CordonofMirages.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! *Dazed to your hand. NL ${modID}:Glimpse !M!. NL ${modID}:Flourish.

${modID}:MagiciansHaze.NAME: Magicians Haze
${modID}:MagiciansHaze.DESCRIPTION: Remove all your orbs, channel that many ${modID}:Icicles plus !M! . NL ${modID}:Tilt !${modID}:M2! : Discard your hand draw that many cards plus !M! .

${modID}:FrozenRose.NAME: Frozen Rose
${modID}:FrozenRose.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! . NL When Attacked, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:SinisterStrike.NAME: Sinister Strike
${modID}:SinisterStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Flourish twice, then ${modID}:Sheathe the top card of your draw pile.

${modID}:DiamondDust.NAME: Diamond Dust
${modID}:DiamondDust.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! [${modID}:BlockIcon] . NL Deal !D! damage and apply !M! [dragonmod:ChillIcon] to ALL enemies.

${modID}:DeadlyShot.NAME: Deadly Throw
${modID}:DeadlyShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! [dragonmod:LockonIcon] . NL increase this cards damage by the power of the removed ${modID}:Icicle for the rest of combat.

${modID}:MyriadImages.NAME: Myriad Images
${modID}:MyriadImages.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Tilt !${modID}:M2! : Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL ALL enemies lose !M! [${modID}:StrengthIcon] this turn.

${modID}:FrigidForm.NAME: Frigid Form
${modID}:FrigidForm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !${modID}:M2! Orb Slots. NL Whenever you remove an ${modID}:Icicle, gain !M! [dragonmod:SubzeroIcon] .

${modID}:Hailstorm.NAME: Hailstorm
${modID}:Hailstorm.DESCRIPTION: Channel X ${modID}:Icicles. NL Next Turn, Orb Passive effects activate X additional times. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ArcaneCurtain.NAME: Arcane Curtain
${modID}:ArcaneCurtain.DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the start of your turn {!M!|@=${modID}:Flourish then ${modID}:Sheathe the top card of your draw pile it costs 0 until played.|2=${modID}:Flourish twice then ${modID}:Sheathe the !M! top cards of your draw pile they cost 0 until played.|3=${modID}:Flourish !M! times then ${modID}:Sheathe the !M! top cards of your draw pile they cost 0 until played.}
${modID}:ArcaneCurtain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Innate. NL At the start of your turn {!M!|@=${modID}:Flourish then ${modID}:Sheathe the top card of your draw pile it costs 0 until played.|2=${modID}:Flourish twice then ${modID}:Sheathe the !M! top cards of your draw pile they cost 0 until played.|3=${modID}:Flourish !M! times then ${modID}:Sheathe the !M! top cards of your draw pile they cost 0 until played.}

${modID}:WinterWoe.NAME: Winter Woe
${modID}:WinterWoe.DESCRIPTION: Double your [dragonmod:SubzeroIcon] . NL Channel an ${modID}:Icicle. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:WinterWoe.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Triple your [dragonmod:SubzeroIcon] . NL Channel an ${modID}:Icicle. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Scintilla.NAME: Scintilla
${modID}:Scintilla.DESCRIPTION: When attacked, reduce the damage by half then deal that much + !M! damage back and apply [dragonmod:BleedIcon] equal to the damage dealt.

${modID}:TempoTheft.NAME: Tempo Theft
${modID}:TempoTheft.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !${modID}:M2! [dragonmod:SlowIcon] and enemy takes !${modID}:M2! damage whenever they gain [dragonmod:BlockIcon] . NL ${modID}:Exploit any 3: Gain !${modID}:M2! [dragonmod:DexterityIcon] and Next turn, Draw !M! cards.

${modID}:ThousandKnives.NAME: Thousand Knives
${modID}:ThousandKnives.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn and whenever you ${modID}:Flourish, add {!M!|1=a *Shiv|1>=!M! *Shivs}{@@} to your hand.

${modID}:RisingCresent.NAME: Rising Cresent
${modID}:RisingCresent.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! [${modID}:WeakIcon] . NL Gain 1 [${modID}:EmeraldBlossomIcon] .

${modID}:AmberHaze.NAME: Amber Haze
${modID}:AmberHaze.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! [${modID}:BlockIcon] . NL Deal !D! damage twice. NL ${modID}:Recenter.

${modID}:MountainMists.NAME: Mountain Mists
${modID}:MountainMists.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! [${modID}:BlockIcon] . NL When Attacked, Apply !M! [${modID}:PoisonIcon] to the attacker.

${modID}:PeircingLight.NAME: Piercing Light
${modID}:PeircingLight.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Recenter and gain !M! [${modID}:EmeraldBlossomIcon] - Enter ${modID}:Dawn.

${modID}:NightmareShroud.NAME: Nightmare Shroud
${modID}:NightmareShroud.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card. NL ${modID}:Exploit [${modID}:PoisonIcon] : Deal !D! damage again, else apply !M! [${modID}:HexIcon] .

${modID}:DriftingMoon.NAME: Drifting Moon
${modID}:DriftingMoon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Conjure a random card. NL Draw a card.

${modID}:Wingbeat.NAME: Wingbeat
${modID}:Wingbeat.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card ${modID}:Vanishes, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

${modID}:BlazingEdge.NAME: Blazing Edge
${modID}:BlazingEdge.DESCRIPTION: Retain. Unplayable. NL When drawn or ${modID}:Vanish : Deal !M! damage to a random enemy twice.
${modID}:BlazingEdge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn or ${modID}:Vanish : Deal !M! damage to a random enemy twice.

${modID}:ShadowBreak.NAME: Shadow Break
${modID}:ShadowBreak.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust the card left of this. NL Deal !D! damage.

${modID}:MirrorBlade.NAME: Mirror Blade
${modID}:MirrorBlade.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Banish the card right of this. NL ${modID}:Illude the card left of this

${modID}:Solstice.NAME: Dream Blade
${modID}:Solstice.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Remove and ${modID}:Illude the top card of your draw pile. NL Apply !M! [${modID}:HexIcon] .

${modID}:DreamLance.NAME: Moonlight Sweep
${modID}:DreamLance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Remove and ${modID}:Illude the top 2 cards of your draw pile. NL Apply !M! [${modID}:WeakIcon] .

${modID}:RoaringWind.NAME: Roaring Wind
${modID}:RoaringWind.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 [${modID}:AmethystBlossomIcon] . NL While in ${modID}:Dusk Deal !M! damage to a random enemy after you draw a card during your turn.

${modID}:YinYangTalisman.NAME: Yin-Yang Talisman
${modID}:YinYangTalisman.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! [${modID}:BlockIcon] . NL ${modID}:Banish a card in your Exhaust pile to gain !M! Strength.

${modID}:WingsofHeaven.NAME: Wings of Heaven
${modID}:WingsofHeaven.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! [${modID}:EmeraldBlossomIcon] . NL Enter ${modID}:Dawn or ${modID}:Dusk.

${modID}:ShadeDancer.NAME: Shade Dancer
${modID}:ShadeDancer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card. NL ${modID}:Exploit [${modID}:PoisonIcon] : deal !D! damage and gain 1 [${modID}:EmeraldBlossomIcon] .

${modID}:FieryDance.NAME: Fiery Dance
${modID}:FieryDance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy twice. NL Draw a Card. NL If its an Attack deal !D! damage to a random enemy and gain 1 [${modID}:EmeraldBlossomIcon] .

${modID}:PetalBlizzard.NAME: Petal Blizzard
${modID}:PetalBlizzard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy and gain 1 [${modID}:EmeraldBlossomIcon] , [${modID}:AmberBlossomIcon] , or [${modID}:AmethystBlossomIcon] at random !M! times. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:FeatherDance.NAME: Feather Dance
${modID}:FeatherDance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! [${modID}:BlockIcon] . NL Gain !M! [${modID}:ReinforceIcon] . NL Enter ${modID}:Dawn or ${modID}:Dusk.

${modID}:WaterfowlDance.NAME: Waterfowl Dance
${modID}:WaterfowlDance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL ${modID}:Recenter.

${modID}:DartingBlow.NAME: Darting Blow
${modID}:DartingBlow.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !M! Vigor. NL At the start of your turn gain !M! Vigor.

${modID}:Hubris.NAME: Hubris
${modID}:Hubris.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Retain. NL While in hand, if you take unblocked attack damage gain !M! Weak and Frail then Discard this card.
